chapter_description.p: The Time Functions module provides tools for working with dates, times, and durations in Nelson.

It supports querying the current time, measuring elapsed time, performing calculations on dates and times, converting between different time representations, and handling calendar-specific operations such as leap years and month-end calculations.
This module enables precise time management, scheduling, and performance measurement in scripts and applications.

keyword.name: addtodate
keyword.description: Modify date number by field.

keyword.name: clock
keyword.description: Return the current local date and time as a date vector.

keyword.name: cputime
keyword.description: Return the CPU time used by your Nelon session.

keyword.name: date
keyword.description: Return the Current date as character vector.

keyword.name: datenum
keyword.description: Return the date/time input as a serial day number.

keyword.name: datestr
keyword.description: Convert date and time to string format.

keyword.name: datevec
keyword.description: Convert a serial date number into a date vector.

keyword.name: eomday
keyword.description: Returns last day of month.

keyword.name: etime
keyword.description: Time elapsed between date vectors.

keyword.name: hour
